title: 呢個email 係咪約魚email 黎

replies.msg:
又唔係美國人做乜俾個咁既email 我

已經唔好講we’re tired of looking at fake polls from the biased mainstream media.但佢個投票選項仲bias 過其他

會link 去呢個page (建議用private mode 開，唔好留留任何野）
https://www.cagop.org/trump_presidency_poll

成篇email 係咁


????, if you support OUR president and want to prove the mainstream media wrong, I need your input today. Will you take our CAGOP Trump Approval Poll?

After just one year in office, President Trump has reduced illegal immigration, defeated ISIS, created millions of jobs, and restored American leadership throughout the world.

But the liberal media does NOT want you to know this. They will undermine OUR president at every turn. ????, we’re tired of looking at fake polls from the biased mainstream media. That’s why we want to go straight to you: Will you take our Trump Approval Poll?
CAGOP Trump Approval Poll
How would you describe the Trump Presidency so far?
WINNING
TERRIFIC
GOOD
OKAY
OTHER

Thank you for taking the time today to show our great President we all support him. Together, we will Make America Great Again!

Sincerely,
Chairman Jim Brulte
California Republican Party


PAID FOR BY CALIFORNIA REPUBLICAN PARTY
NOT AUTHORIZED BY ANY CANDIDATE OR CANDIDATE’S COMMITTEE.
(WWW.CAGOP.ORG)
未訓醒打錯字添
